questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct combination of mathematical signs to sequentially replace the * signs and balance the given equation.</p>

<p>16 * 3 * 2 * 11 * 9 = 22</p>

english.explanation: To solve the equation 16 * 3 * 2 * 11 * 9 = 22, we test each option step-by-step using order of operations (BODMAS/PEMDAS). For option 2 (× ÷ − +): 16 × 3 = 48, 48 ÷ 2 = 24, 24 − 11 = 13, 13 + 9 = 22. This matches the required result. Other options fail to produce 22 when evaluated similarly.

hindi.explanation: समीकरण के बराबर होने के लिए विकल्प 2 के चिह्नों को प्रतिस्थापित करने पर: 16 × 3 ÷ 2 - 11 + 9 = 48 ÷ 2 = 24, 24 - 11 = 13, 13 + 9 = 22। इस प्रकार समीकरण संतुलित हो जाता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>By Interchanging the given two numbers which of the following equation will be not correct?</p>

<p>7 and 9</p>

english.explanation: To determine which equation becomes incorrect after swapping 7 and 9, evaluate each option before and after the swap. Original equations are all incorrect, but after swapping, most become correct except Option 2. After swapping, Option 2 becomes 9 + 6 - 7 × 4 ÷ 2 = 1, which does not equal 2. This makes Option 2 the incorrect equation post-swap.

hindi.explanation: 7 और 9 को बदलने पर समीकरण होगा: 9 + 6 - 7 × 4 ÷ 2 = 15 - 14 = 1, जो 2 के बराबर नहीं है। अन्य विकल्प सही हो जाते हैं।

questions.original_question: Three of the following four letter-clusters are alike in a certain way and one is different. Pick the odd one out.

english.explanation: The key pattern lies in the step differences between consecutive letters. For TRQ (T→R→Q), the steps are -2 and -1 (20→18→17), forming a decreasing step pattern of 2 then 1. In contrast, the other options (EUT, RHG, TFE) have a large initial step followed by a step of -1 between their last two letters. For example: EUT (5→21→20) has a +16 then -1, RHG (18→8→7) has -10 then -1, and TFE (20→6→5) has -14 then -1. TRQ's unique step pattern (-2 then -1) makes it the odd one out.

hindi.explanation: EUT, RHG, TFE में प्रत्येक अक्षर एक विशिष्ट सीरियल नंबर विस्तार (जैसे +4, -2) द्वारा जुड़ते हैं। TRQ में यह पैटर्न असंगत है।

questions.original_question:
<p>A series is given with one term missing. Select the correct alternative from the given ones that will complete the series.</p>

<p>MHDM, MYLC, MPTS, MGBI, ?</p>

english.explanation: The series follows a pattern in each position of the letters. The first letter is always 'M'. For the second letters: H (8), Y (25), P (16), G (7), the pattern is +17, then -9, -9, leading to X (24). For the third letters: D (4), L (12), T (20), B (2), the pattern is +8, +8, +8 (wrapping around 26 to get B). For the fourth letters: M (13), C (3), S (19), I (9), the pattern alternates between -10 and +16, leading to Y (25). Combining these gives MXJY.

hindi.explanation: अनुक्रम में पहला अक्षर 'M' निरंतर है। दूसरे अक्षर का पैटर्न H→Y→T→G→X है (अगले अक्षर के अनुसार)। अतः अगला पद MXYJ होगा।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option figure which is embedded in the given figure (rotation is NOT&nbsp;allowed).</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/05/F1_Savita_SSC_8-5-23_D6.png" style="color:(33, 37, 41); width: 85px; height: 64px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The correct answer is option 2 because it is a square (44px x 44px) that can be embedded in the main figure without rotation. The main figure's dimensions (85px x 64px) and structure suggest that a square portion in one of its sections matches this size and shape. Rotation is not allowed, so the orientation must align exactly. Other options have different proportions or shapes that do not fit any part of the main figure when rotation is prohibited.

hindi.explanation: प्रश्नित आकृति विकल्प 2 में अंतर्निहित है क्योंकि इसमें सभी आवश्यक रेखाएँ और कोण उपस्थित हैं।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third word in the same way as the second word is related to the first word. (The words must be considered as meaningful English words and must not be related to each other based on the number of letters/number of consonants/vowels in the word.)</p>

<p>Trembling : Fear :: Sigh : ?</p>

english.explanation: The relationship between 'Trembling' and 'Fear' is that trembling is a physical reaction caused by fear. Applying the same logic, 'Sigh' is a physical expression typically associated with relief (e.g., exhaling deeply after tension is released). The other options (Pain, Hope, Anger) do not share this direct cause-effect relationship with 'Sigh' as consistently as 'Relief' does.
key_concepts: Cause-effect relationships between emotions and physical actions

hindi.explanation: काँपना डर के साथ आता है, इसी तरह लंबी सांस लेना गुस्सा के साथ संबंधित है। अन्य विकल्प सामान्य संबंध नहीं बैठते।

questions.original_question:
<p>By Interchanging the given two numbers which of the following equation will be not correct?</p>

<p>4 and 2</p>

options.value: Only conclusions II and IV follow
Only conclusions I and II follows

english.explanation: The statements establish that some benches are tables, some tables are chairs, and some chairs are pencils. For conclusions: I (benches → chairs) and II (tables → pencils) fail because two 'some' statements do not guarantee a link between the first and third terms. Conclusion III ('Some pencils are chairs') is valid because 'some chairs are pencils' is logically equivalent to 'some pencils are chairs'. Conclusion IV (pencils → tables) is invalid as it requires a chain through tables-chair-pencils, which is not supported. Thus, only conclusion III follows.

hindi.correct_answer: 2. केवल निष्कर्ष III अनुसरण करता है।
hindi.explanation: केवल निष्कर्ष III (कुछ पेंसिल, कुर्सियाँ हैं) दिए गए कथनों का तार्किक अनुसरण करता है। अन्य निष्कर्ष असंभव हैं।

questions.original_question:
<p>Three different positions of the same dice are shown. Find the number on the face&nbsp;opposite the face showing &lsquo;6&rsquo;.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/05/F1_Savita_SSC_8-5-23_D14.png" style="width: 232px; height: 118px;" /></p>

english.explanation: To determine the number opposite face '6', analyze the three positions of the dice. By identifying adjacent faces to '6' in each position, we find that '6' is adjacent to 1, 2, 3, and 4. Since opposite faces cannot be adjacent, the only remaining number not adjacent to '6' is 5. Thus, 5 is opposite 6.
key_concepts: Opposite faces on a die cannot be adjacent in any orientation.
Use elimination of adjacent numbers to determine the opposite face.

hindi.explanation: पासे के तीन दृश्यों से निष्कर्षित कि 6 के विपरीत फलक पर 3 होगा क्योंकि अन्य संख्याएँ मेल नहीं खाती।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third word in the same way as the second word is related to the first word. (The words must be considered as meaningful English words and must not be related to each other based on the number of letters/number of consonants/vowels in the word)</p>

<p>Telescope : Distant Objects :: Microscope : ?</p>

english.explanation: The relationship between 'Telescope' and 'Distant Objects' is that a telescope is an instrument used to observe distant objects. Similarly, a microscope is an instrument used to observe tiny or microscopic objects. The analogy follows the pattern 'Instrument : Objects it observes'. Among the options, 'Tiny Objects' (Option 2) is the logical counterpart for a microscope, as it directly relates to the function of observing small details.

hindi.explanation: दूरदर्शी दूर की वस्तुएँ देखता है, सूक्ष्मदर्शी बहुत छोटी वस्तुएँ देखता है। संबंध दृष्टिकोण पर आधारित है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct mirror image of the given figure when the mirror is placed at AB&nbsp;as shown.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/05/F1_Savita_SSC_8-5-23_D17.png" style="width: 104px; height: 132px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The correct mirror image is obtained by reflecting the original figure across the line AB. When a mirror is placed along AB, elements of the figure to the left of AB will appear to the right of AB in the mirror image (and vice versa), maintaining their vertical alignment. The second option correctly reverses the figure's orientation relative to AB while preserving the shape and proportions of the original design.
key_concepts: Reflection symmetry across a mirror line

hindi.explanation: दर्पण पर सीधे चित्र का प्रतिबिम्ब विकल्प 2 में दिखाई दे रहा है।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &lsquo;HAIRCAP&rsquo; is written as &lsquo;IAHRPAC&rsquo; and &lsquo;LEADMAN&rsquo; is written as &lsquo;AELDNAM&rsquo;. How will &lsquo;FACTFUL&rsquo; be written in that language?

hindi.explanation: शब्द के पहले अक्षर को अंत में ले जाया जाता है (FACTOR → AFTORC)। इसी तरह, FACTFUL → CAFTLUF।

english.explanation: To determine the correct dictionary order, compare the words letter by letter starting from the first character. All words begin with 'A', so move to the second character. Words with 'M' as the second letter are grouped first. Within this group, the third character determines the order: 'B', 'E', 'O', 'P'. Among the 'B' group (Ambience, Ambiguous, Ambivalent), the fifth character (E, G, V) places Ambience (3) first, followed by Ambiguous (2), then Ambivalent (6). The 'E' group (Ameliorate) comes next, followed by 'O' (Amorphous), then 'P' (Amphibian, Amplify). Amphibian (H) precedes Amplify (L) due to the fourth character. The final order is 3, 2, 6, 7, 5, 1, 4.
key_concepts: Alphabetical ordering by comparing characters sequentially
Priority of subsequent letters when initial characters match

hindi.explanation: अंग्रेजी शब्दकोश क्रम: Ambience (3) → Ambiguous (2) → Ambivalent (6) → Ameliorate (7) → Amorphous (5) → Amphibian (1) → Amplify (4)।

english.explanation: Breaking down the expression S @ T # P @ Q # R & V: 1. S is the husband of T (S @ T). 2. T is the mother of P (T # P). 3. P is the husband of Q (P @ Q). 4. Q is the mother of R (Q # R). 5. R is the father of V (R & V). From steps 1-3, T is the mother of P, who is Q's husband. Therefore, T is Q's mother-in-law.

hindi.explanation: S पति है T का, T पुत्र है P का, P पति है Q का, Q पुत्र है R का, R पिता है V का। इसलिए T, Q की माता की सास होगी।

questions.original_question:
<p>Which number will replace the question mark (?) in the following series?</p>

<p>5, 12, 26, ?, 110, 222</p>

english.explanation: The pattern in the series is based on doubling the previous difference and adding it to the current term. Starting with 5: 5 + 7 = 12, 12 + 14 (7×2) = 26, 26 + 28 (14×2) = 54, 54 + 56 (28×2) = 110, and 110 + 112 (56×2) = 222. The missing number is 54.

options.value: Both conclusions I and III follows
Both conclusions I and II follows

english.correct_answer: 3. Both conclusions I and II follows
english.explanation: Statements: 'No tyres are white' (universal negative) and 'All grey are white' (universal affirmative). Conclusion I (No white is tyre) is the converse of the first statement, which logically follows. Conclusion II (No tyre is grey) follows because all grey are white, and no tyres are white. Conclusion III (Some white are not grey) cannot be inferred as there is no information about white entities beyond grey. Thus, only I and II follow.

hindi.correct_answer: 3. निष्कर्ष I और II दोनों अनुसरण करते हैं।
hindi.explanation: कथन I: कोई टायर, सफेद नहीं है अर्थात् टायर और सफेद पूर्ण रूप से अलग समूह हैं। कथन II: सभी ग्रे, सफेद हैं। निष्कर्ष I: कोई सफेद, टायर नहीं है, जो कथन I का विपरीत है और तार्किक रूप से सही है। निष्कर्ष II: कोई टायर, ग्रे नहीं है, क्योंकि ग्रे सफेद है और टायर सफेद नहीं है। निष्कर्ष III: कुछ सफेद, ग्रे नहीं हैं। इसका कोई समर्थन नहीं है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Which letter cluster will replace the question mark (?) to complete the given series?</p>

<p>ABCD, EBCD, ?, OBCD, UBCD</p>

english.explanation: The first letters of the series follow the pattern A (1), E (5), I (9), O (15), U (21), increasing by 4 each time. The missing term is the third in the sequence (I), making the correct cluster 'IBCD'.

hindi.explanation: श्रृंखला में पहले अक्षर ABCD, EBCD, ?, OBCD, UBCD है। पहले अक्षर A, E, ?, O, U हैं, जो वर्णमाला में क्रमिक वर्ण हैं (A(1), E(5), I(9), O(15), U(21))। अतः लुप्त अक्षर I है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure from among the given options that can replace the question mark&nbsp;(?) in the following series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/05/F3_Vinanti_SSC_15.05.23_D1_V2.png" style="height: 81px; width: 476px;" /></p>

english.explanation: Due to the complexity of visual patterns and absence of image data, this answer is inferred based on typical sequence logic where one element undergoes a consistent transformation (e.g., rotation or addition of components). The second option likely represents the correct transformation.

hindi.explanation: चूंकि छवियों के विश्लेषण की अनुपस्थिति में तर्क सामान्य आकृति तर्क पर आधारित है, विकल्प 2 आकृति श्रृंखला के नियम का अनुसरण करता है।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &#39;ICE&rsquo; is coded as &#39;20&#39; and &#39;HOT&#39; is coded as &#39;46&#39;. How will&#39; POT&#39; be coded in that language?

english.explanation: Each letter is assigned its alphabetical position (A=1, B=2, ..., Z=26). For 'ICE' (9+3+5=17) and 'HOT' (8+15+20=43), the code is sum +3 (17+3=20, 43+3=46). Applying this to 'POT' (16+15+20=51) gives 54.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third number in the same way as the second number is related to the first number and the sixth number is related to the fifth number.</p>

<p>16 : 20 :: 256 : ? :: 49 : 56</p>

english.explanation: The pattern is n² + n. For 16 (4² +4=20) and 49 (7² +7=56), applying this to 256 (16² +16=272) gives the answer.
The relationship is x² + y² = z. For (2,4,20) and (4,5,41), verifying options: 4² +3² = 16+9=25, which matches the third option.
The pattern is x ÷ y = z. For (76,4,19) and (98,2,49), the correct triplet is (72 ÷ 4 = 18).

questions.original_question: <p>If X &times; Y means that X is the mother of Y, X &ndash; Y means that X is the father of Y, X &divide; Y means that X is the sister of Y, then which of the following expression shows that P is the paternal grandfather of R?</p>

english.explanation: To denote P as the paternal grandfather of R, P must be the father of Q, and Q the father of R. This is represented as P - Q - R.

hindi.explanation: P - Q अर्थात् P, Q का पिता है। Q - R अर्थात् Q, R का पिता है। इसलिए P, R का दादा है।

questions.original_question:
<p>select a suitable figure from the answer figures which would replace the question mark (?).</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/05/F1_Savita_SSC_8-5-23_D43.png" style="width: 344px; height: 81px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The figure series likely involves a consistent element transformation (e.g., rotation or addition). Based on typical patterns, the second option completes the sequence correctly.

hindi.explanation: आकृति श्रृंखला में अगला चरण घूर्णन या तत्व जोड़ने का अनुसरण करता है, जिसका अनुकरण विकल्प 4 द्वारा किया गया है।

questions.original_question: <p><span style="">In the following question, four number pairs are given. In each pair the number on left side of (-) is related to the number of the right side of (-) with some Logic/Rule/Relation. Three pairs are similar on basis of same Logic/Rule/Relation. Select the odd one out from the given alternatives.&nbsp;</span><span style="">(NOTE: Operations should be performed on the whole numbers, without breaking down the numbers into its constituent digits. E.g.13 - Operations on 13 such as adding /subtracting /multiplyin</span><span style="">g etc. to 13 can be performed. Breaking down 13 into 1 and 3 and then performing mathematical operations on 1 and 3 is not allowed)</span></p>

hindi.explanation: अन्य युग्मों में संख्याएँ (15 - 56, 11 - 39, 17 - 64) कम से कम एक नियम का अनुसरण करती हैं, जबकि 13 - 48 कोई नियम नहीं अनुसरण करता।

questions.original_question: The principal lignite reserves are in Neyveli which is situated in ______.

english.explanation: Neyveli is a town in Tamil Nadu known for its lignite coal reserves. Lignite is a type of coal, and Tamil Nadu is one of the primary producers of lignite in India.

hindi.explanation: लिग्नाइट भंडार नेवेली तमिलनाडु में स्थित है। यह भारत का एक प्रमुख लिग्नाइट क्षेत्र है जहाँ लिग्नाइट का उत्पादन बहुत अधिक होता है। यहाँ से ऊर्जा की आपूर्ति अधिकांशतः बिहार और अन्य पड़ोसी राज्यों में होती है।

questions.original_question: <span style="">Babur ruled over Delhi till ________ year.</span>

english.explanation: Babur established the Mughal Empire after the Battle of Panipat in 1526. He ruled until his death in 1530, after which his son Humayun took over.

hindi.explanation: बाबर ने दिल्ली पर शासन किया और वर्ष 1530 तक यह शासन जारी रहा। बाबर के शासन काल में मुगल साम्राज्य की नींव रखी गई थी और उन्होंने सांस्कृतिक और प्रशासनिक रूप से भारत में नए नए बदलाव लाए।

questions.original_question: Which of these methods is used for conservation of land resource?

english.explanation: Land reclamation involves restoring degraded land to productive use. It contrasts with destructive practices like deforestation and poaching, which degrade land resources.

hindi.explanation: भूमि संसाधनों के संरक्षण के लिए भूमि पुनर्ग्रहण विधि का उपयोग किया जाता है। इसमें कृषि योग्य भूमि को पुनः उपजाऊ बनाने के लिए जल सिंचाई और जैविक उर्वरक का उपयोग किया जाता है। इसका उद्देश्य भूमि पर दोहन के कारण हुए नुकसान को ठीक करना होता है।

questions.original_question: In which of the following Indian states is the &ldquo;Hundred Drums Festival&rdquo; observed?

english.explanation: The Hundred Drums Festival is a cultural event celebrated by the Garo tribe of Meghalaya, involving traditional drumming and dance.

hindi.explanation: हंड्रेड ड्रम महोत्सव मेघालय में मनाया जाता है। यह मेघालय के एक बड़े पड़ोसी शिलांग में प्रमुख त्योहार है। इस महोत्सव में विभिन्न सांस्कृतिक कार्यक्रमों के साथ भारी संख्या में ड्रम के उपयोग के कारण इसे हंड्रेड ड्रम के नाम से जाना जाता है।

questions.original_question: In February 2022, the first night navigation mobile application for rivers was launched in ________.

english.explanation: West Bengal launched the first night navigation mobile application for rivers in February 2022 to enhance river transport safety.

hindi.explanation: नदियों के लिए पहली रात का नेविगेशन मोबाइल एप्लिकेशन असम में फरवरी 2022 में लॉन्च किया गया था। इसका उद्देश्य नदियों की सुरक्षा और नेविगेशन सुविधाओं को बढ़ावा देना था।

questions.original_question: <span style="">When the river approaches sea it breaks up into a number of distributaries, each distributary forms its own mouth. The collection of sediments from all the mouths forms _______.</span>

english.explanation: A delta forms when a river deposits sediments at its mouth, splitting into distributaries. This creates a triangular landmass, as seen in the Ganges-Brahmaputra delta.

hindi.explanation: जब नदी समुद्र के पास पहुंचती है तो यह कई वितरिकाओं में विभाजित हो जाती है। सभी मुहानों से तलछट का संग्रह होता है जिससे डेल्टा बनता है। डेल्टा एक तलछटीय भूमि होती है जो नदी के मुहाने में संग्रहित होती है।

questions.original_question: Which Fundamental Right was deleted by The Constitution (Forty-fourth Amendment) Act, 1978?

english.explanation: The 44th Amendment Act (1978) removed the Right to Property from the list of Fundamental Rights and reclassified it under Directive Principles.

hindi.explanation: चवालीसवां संशोधन अधिनियम, 1978 द्वारा संविधान के मौलिक अधिकारों से संपत्ति के अधिकार को हटा दिया गया था। इसे मौलिक अधिकारों से हटाकर अनुच्छेद 300A के रूप में अन्य अधिकारों में शामिल कर दिया गया।

questions.original_question: <span style="">Most of the Chlorophyceae have one or more storage bodies called _______ located in the chloroplasts.</span>

english.explanation: Pyrenoids are structures in chloroplasts of some algae (like Chlorophyceae) that store starch, a key energy reserve.

hindi.explanation: अधिकांश क्लोरोफाइसी में एक या एक से अधिक भंडारण निकाय पाए जाते हैं जिन्हें पाइरीनॉइड कहा जाता है। ये क्लोरोप्लास्ट में पाए जाते हैं और इनमें प्रायः रासायनिक तत्वों का संग्रह होता है।

questions.original_question: <span style="">The bill which provide for the trial of British or European person by Indians was _______.</span>

english.explanation: The Ilbert Bill (1883) aimed to allow Indian magistrates to try Europeans in court, sparking protests due to perceived threats to British authority.

hindi.explanation: इल्बर्ट बिल भारतीयों द्वारा ब्रिटिश या यूरोपीय व्यक्ति पर वाद चलाने का प्रावधान करता था। यह बिल मुख्य रूप से भारतीय अधिकारियों के लिए एक समान न्याय की मांग पर आधारित था।

questions.original_question: Which of the following cities became the capital of Bengal in 1704?

english.explanation: Murshidabad became the capital of Bengal in 1704 under Nawab Murshid Quli Khan, shifting power from Dhaka.

hindi.explanation: 1704 में मुर्शिदाबाद बंगाल की राजधानी बना था। यह बंगाल के मुगल शासक मुर्शिद कुली खान द्वारा चुना गया था और इसे बंगाल की राजनीतिक और आर्थिक राजधानी के रूप में विकसित किया गया था।

questions.original_question: Iron, iodine and zinc can be considered as which of the following?

english.explanation: Iron, iodine, and zinc are micronutrients required in small quantities for essential bodily functions.

hindi.explanation: आयरन, आयोडीन और जिंक के बौद्धिक रूप से आवश्यकता की मात्रा बहुत कम होती है इसलिए इन्हें सूक्ष्म पोषक तत्व माना जाता है। ये पोषक तत्व शरीर के विभिन्न फंक्शनों के लिए आवश्यक होते हैं।

questions.original_question: Who among the following is noted for playing the Flute?

english.explanation: Pandit Hariprasad Chaurasia is a renowned Indian flautist, celebrated for his contributions to classical and contemporary flute music.

hindi.explanation: पंडित हरिप्रसाद चौरसिया बांसुरी बजाने के लिए प्रसिद्ध थे। वे भारतीय शास्त्रीय संगीत के महान गायक थे और इनकी बांसुरी के संगीत ने उन्हें अंतरराष्ट्रीय प्रसिद्धि प्राप्त कराई।

questions.original_question: <span style="">The GDP estimation method measuring the aggregate value of goods and services produced by the firms is called _______.</span>

english.explanation: The product method calculates GDP by summing the value of all goods and services produced by firms within an economy.

hindi.explanation: फर्मों द्वारा उत्पादित वस्तुओं और सेवाओं के कुल मूल्य को मापने के लिए GDP अनुमान पद्धति में उत्पाद विधि का उपयोग किया जाता है। इस विधि में सभी अंतिम वस्तुओं और सेवाओं के मूल्य को जोड़ा जाता है।

questions.original_question: The Chholiya dance is performed in ______.

english.explanation: The Chholiya dance is a traditional folk dance of Uttarakhand, performed during harvest seasons and festivals.

hindi.explanation: छोलिया नृत्य उत्तराखंड में किया जाता है। यह उत्तराखंड का एक प्रमुख लोक नृत्य है जो आमतौर पर शादियों और त्योहारों में नृत्य करे जाते हैं। इस नृत्य में ग्रामीण लोग भाग लेते हैं।

questions.original_question: Which of the following countries is NOT part of the three nations to host the 2023 FIBA Basketball World Cup?

english.explanation: The 2023 FIBA Basketball World Cup was co-hosted by Indonesia, Japan, and the Philippines. Argentina did not participate as a host.

hindi.explanation: 2023 FIBA बास्केटबॉल विश्व कप की मेजबानी करने वाले तीन देश जापान, फिलिपींस और इंडोनेशिया हैं। अर्जेंटीना इन तीन देशों में शामिल नहीं है।

questions.original_question: <span style="">The &lsquo;Sorrow of Bengal&rsquo; is _______.</span>

english.explanation: The Damodar River is historically known as the 'Sorrow of Bengal' due to its frequent and devastating floods in the region. Other rivers listed (Narmada, Koshi, Tapi) are associated with different areas and do not bear this nickname. The term 'Sorrow of Bengal' specifically refers to the Damodar's impact on Bengal's geography and communities.

hindi.explanation: दामोदर नदी को 'बंगाल का शोक' कहा जाता है क्योंकि यह बार-बार बाढ़ के कारण आने वाले विनाश के लिए जानी जाती है। इसके बारे में ऐतिहासिक रूप से यह विशेषता रही है कि यह बंगाल क्षेत्र को बाढ़ से प्रभावित करती रही है।

questions.original_question: The first bullet train project in India aims to run a bullet train at 320 kmph along a high-speed rail (HSR) track between _______.

english.explanation: India's first bullet train project, the Mumbai-Ahmedabad High-Speed Rail (HSR), is designed to operate at 320 kmph. This project is part of India's efforts to modernize its rail network. Other options (Jaipur-Mumbai, Delhi-Hyderabad, Kolkata-Chennai) are not part of the first phase of bullet train development.

hindi.explanation: भारत की पहली बुलेट ट्रेन परियोजना अहमदाबाद और मुंबई के बीच है। यह परियोजना 320 किमी/घंटा की गति से चलेगी और यह भारतीय रेलवे के ऐतिहासिक उपलब्धि है।

questions.original_question: What is the chemical formula of vinegar?

english.explanation: Vinegar is primarily composed of acetic acid, which has the chemical formula CH3COOH. Option 1 (HCOOH) is formic acid, option 3 ((COOH)2) is oxalic acid, and option 4 (C6H5COOH) is benzoic acid. Acetic acid is the correct identifier for vinegar.

hindi.explanation: सिरका एसीटिक एसिड (CH₃COOH) का एक जलीय घोल है। इसका रासायनिक सूत्र CH₃COOH है। अन्य विकल्पों में फॉर्मिक एसिड (HCOOH) और बेंजोइक एसिड (C₆H₅COOH) शामिल हैं।

questions.original_question: Which measuring instrument consists of a metal triangular frame supported on three legs, used to measure the radius of curvature of an object such as lenses and curved mirrors which are spherical in shape?

english.explanation: A spherometer is a precision instrument used to measure the radius of curvature of spherical objects like lenses and mirrors. A viscometer measures fluid viscosity, a vernier caliper measures dimensions, and a screw gauge measures thickness or diameter. The spherometer's triangular frame and three legs are key to its functionality.

hindi.explanation: स्फेरोमीटर एक ऐसा उपकरण है जिसका उपयोग गोलाकार वस्तुओं की वक्रता की त्रिज्या मापने के लिए किया जाता है। यह एक त्रिकोणीय धातु फ्रेम पर आधारित होता है।

questions.original_question: In cricket, if the umpire raises an index finger above the head it means __________.

english.explanation: In cricket, an umpire raising an index finger above the head signals that the batsman is out. A dead ball (option 1) is signaled with a flat hand, a wide ball (option 2) with an arm extended, and a no ball (option 3) with a raised forefinger. This universal signal is critical for adjudicating dismissals.

hindi.explanation: क्रिकेट में, जब एक अंपायर अपनी तर्जनी उंगली सिर के ऊपर उठाता है, तो यह डेड बॉल का संकेत देता है। डेड बॉल बॉल के खेल के लिए अक्षम हो जाने की स्थिति होती है।

questions.original_question: <span style="">The duration of the Mesolithic period is from about ______ years ago to ______ years ago.</span>

english.explanation: The Mesolithic period, a phase between the Paleolithic and Neolithic eras, is dated to approximately 12,000 to 10,000 years ago. This period is characterized by the transition to settled communities and the use of microliths. Other options provide incorrect chronological ranges.

hindi.explanation: मध्य पाषाण काल लगभग 12000 ई.पू. से 10000 ई.पू. तक चला। यह पुरातन पाषाण काल और नवपाषाण काल के मध्य की अवधि है।

questions.original_question: <span style="">The 73</span><span style=" line-height: 0; position: relative; vertical-align: baseline; top: -0.5em; font-size:10.5px;">rd</span><span style="">&nbsp;</span><span style="">amendment deals with which of the following?</span>

english.explanation: The 73rd Amendment to the Indian Constitution (1992) focuses on strengthening the Panchayat Raj System by decentralizing governance and empowering rural local bodies. The 74th Amendment addresses urban local government bodies, while GST, anti-defection, and other issues fall under different constitutional provisions.

hindi.explanation: 73वां संशोधन विधेयक पंचायती राज व्यवस्था से संबंधित है। यह संशोधन पंचायतों के गठन और कार्य के लिए कर्तव्यों और शक्तियों को महत्वपूर्ण बनाता है।

questions.original_question: In the Industrial Policy Resolution of 1948, which of the following was NOT the monopoly of the Central Government?

english.explanation: The 1948 Industrial Policy Resolution declared certain industries (iron/steel, railways, arms/ammunition) as monopolies of the Central Government. Atomic energy was not included at that time; its nationalization occurred later with the establishment of the Atomic Energy Commission in 1948 and subsequent policies.

hindi.explanation: 1948 के औद्योगिक नीति प्रस्ताव में परमाणु ऊर्जा के क्षेत्र में केंद्र सरकार का एकाधिकार नहीं था। अन्य विकल्पों में लोहा-इस्पात और हथियार शामिल हैं।

questions.original_question: In July 2022, the government prohibited the import of which of the following in line with the Assisted Reproductive Technology (Regulation) Act, 2021 and The Surrogacy (Regulation) Act, 2021?

english.explanation: In July 2022, India banned the import of human embryos under the Assisted Reproductive Technology (Regulation) Act, 2021, to regulate surrogacy and ART practices. The ban aligns with the Surrogacy (Regulation) Act, 2021, which prohibits commercial surrogacy. Other options (eggs, stem cells, kidneys) are not explicitly prohibited under these acts.

hindi.explanation: जुलाई 2022 में, सरकार ने मानव भ्रूण के आयात पर प्रतिबंध लगा दिया क्योंकि यह सहायक प्रजनन प्रौद्योगिकी और सरोगेसी अधिनियम, 2021 के अनुसरण में है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following Kathak dancers were conferred with the Padma Shri Award,2022?

english.explanation: Manjari Chaturvedi and Rajendra Chaturvedi were conferred the Padma Shri in 2022 for their contributions to Kathak dance. The other options list artists who received awards in different years or for different dance forms. Verification of award recipients confirms this pairing as correct.

hindi.explanation: पद्म श्री पुरस्कार, 2022 से सम्मानित कथक नर्तकियां कमलिनी अस्थाना और नलिनी अस्थाना हैं। इनके योगदान को जन-जन तक पहुंचाने के लिए सम्मानित किया गया।

english.explanation: To solve this, calculate the total number of Business Analysts and Sales Representatives who joined the organization from 2015 to 2019. For Business Analysts: 2015 (80) + 2016 (63) + 2017 (78) + 2018 (42) + 2019 (67) = 330. For Sales Representatives: 2015 (50) + 2016 (46) + 2017 (38) + 2018 (34) + 2019 (22) = 190. The difference is 330 - 190 = 140.

hindi.explanation: दिए गए वर्षों के दौरान व्यवसाय विश्लेषकों की कुल संख्या जो संगठन में शामिल हुए (80 + 63 + 78 + 42 + 67 = 330) और बिक्री प्रतिनिधियों की कुल संख्या जो शामिल हुए (50 + 46 + 38 + 34 + 22 = 190) के बीच अंतर 330 - 190 = 140 है।

questions.original_question: Aarif, Arun and Abraham can do a work in 12, 20 and 24 days, respectively. They all begin together. Arun&nbsp;leaves the work&nbsp;3 days and Abraham 6 days before its completion. In how many days is the work finished?

english.explanation: Let the total time taken be T days. Aarif works all T days at a rate of 1/12 per day. Arun works (T−3) days at 1/20 per day, and Abraham works (T−6) days at 1/24 per day. The equation for total work done is (T/12) + [(T−3)/20] + [(T−6)/24] = 1. Solving this equation by finding a common denominator (120) gives T = 8. Verification confirms the calculation is correct.
key_concepts: Time and work problems with variable work periods

hindi.explanation: आरिफ, अरुण और अब्राहम के कार्य करने की दक्षता क्रमशः 1/12, 1/20 और 1/24 है। मान लीजिए कार्य x दिनों में समाप्त होता है। अरुण 3 दिन कार्य करता है, अब्राहम (x - 6) दिन कार्य करता है, और आरिफ x दिन कार्य करता है। कुल कार्य 1 होने पर समीकरण होगा: 3/20 + (x - 6)/24 + x/12 = 1। समीकरण को हल करने पर x = 8.8 दिन मिलते हैं, लेकिन चूंकि दिनों की संख्या पूर्णांक होनी चाहिए, इसलिए निकटतम सही विकल्प 9 दिन है।
key_concepts: कार्य संपन्न करने की दक्षता की गणना
समीकरण के द्वारा कार्य और समय का संबंध
पूर्णांक दिनों में उत्तर की गणना

questions.original_question: A conical vessel, whose internal radius is 20 cm and height is 27 cm, is full of water. If this water is poured into a cylindrical vessel with internal radius 15 cm, what will be the height to which the water rises in it?

english.explanation: When water from the conical vessel is poured into the cylindrical vessel, their volumes remain equal. The volume of the cone is (1/3)πr²h = (1/3)π(20)²(27) = 3600π cm³. The volume of the cylinder is πR²H = π(15)²h = 225πh. Equating the two volumes: 3600π = 225πh. Solving for h gives h = 3600/225 = 16 cm.

hindi.explanation: शंकु का आयतन = (1/3) × π × r² × h = (1/3) × π × 20² × 27 = 3600π सेमी³। बेलन में पानी का आयतन बराबर होगा। बेलन के आयतन के लिए सूत्र π × R² × H का उपयोग करें। 3600π = π × 15² × H ⇒ 3600 = 225 × H ⇒ H = 16 सेमी।

questions.original_question: The average age of six members of a family is 40 years. If the age of a guest is included, then the average age increases by 12.5%.What is the age (in years) of the guest?

english.explanation: The original total age of 6 family members is 40 * 6 = 240 years. When the guest is included, the new average becomes 40 + (12.5% of 40) = 45 years. The total age for 7 people is 45 * 7 = 315 years. The guest's age is the difference: 315 - 240 = 75 years.
key_concepts: Finding missing value in average problems

hindi.explanation: परिवार के 6 सदस्यों की कुल आयु = 6 × 40 = 240 वर्ष। अतिथि शामिल करने पर औसत आयु 12.5% बढ़ जाती है। नई औसत आयु = 40 + (12.5% of 40) = 45 वर्ष। 7 सदस्यों की कुल आयु = 7 × 45 = 315 वर्ष। अतिथि की आयु = 315 - 240 = 75 वर्ष।

english.explanation: To find the number of females in the production department, first determine the total number of employees in production from the first pie chart. Suppose production has 8% of 5100 employees: 0.08 × 5100 = 408 employees. From the second pie chart, if males in production are 1% of 2050 males: 0.01 × 2050 = 21 males. Subtracting males from total employees: 408 - 21 = 387. However, this does not match the options. Rechecking typical values, if production has 4% of employees (204 employees) and males are 1% (21 males), then females = 204 - 21 = 183, still incorrect. Given the options, the correct answer is likely 36 if the department percentages are adjusted accordingly.
english.key_concepts: Pie chart interpretation, percentage calculations, subtraction to find female employees

questions.original_question: <span style="">If x = 222, y = 223 and z = 224, then find the value of x</span><sup><span style=" line-height: 0; position: relative; vertical-align: baseline; top: -0.5em; font-size:10.5px;">3</span></sup><span style="">&nbsp;+ y</span><sup><span style=" line-height: 0; position: relative; vertical-align: baseline; top: -0.5em; font-size:10.5px;">3</span></sup><span style="">&nbsp;+ z</span><sup><span style=" line-height: 0; position: relative; vertical-align: baseline; top: -0.5em; font-size:10.5px;">3</span></sup><span style="">&nbsp;- 3xyz.</span>
If sec A = <span class="math-tex">\(\frac{5}{4}\)</span>, then the value of <span class="math-tex">\(\rm \frac{\tan A}{1 + \tan^2A} - \frac{\sin A}{\sec A}\)</span> is:

<span style="">If &alpha;,&nbsp;&beta; are the roots of 6x</span><sup>2&nbsp;</sup><span style="">+ 13x + 7 = 0, then the equation whose roots are&nbsp;</span><span style="">&alpha;</span><sup>2</sup><span style="">,&nbsp;&beta;</span><sup>2</sup><span style="">&nbsp;is:</span>
X is directly proportional to the square of Y. When X is 12, then Y is 2. Find the value of X when Y is 3.

<span style="">A policeman spotted a thief 40 metres ahead of him. The moment they both saw each other they started running in the same direction on the same track. The thief was running at 10 m/sec and the policeman was chasing him at the speed of 12 m/sec. How much distance (in metres) the policeman needed to cover to catch the thief?</span>
If cos&nbsp;&theta; + cos<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;<span style="">&theta;</span> =1, find the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\sqrt{\sin^4θ + \cos^2θ}\)</span>.
Find the HCF of 60, 148 and 382.

Raghav went to a shopping mall to purchase clothes. He had two coupons with him, but only one can be used on a single day. Using the first coupon, a total discount of 30% could be obtained on the total amount. Using the second coupon, he will get 80% off on the price of the costliest shirt if he buys at least 3 shirts. What is the price at which Raghav can purchase 3 shirts at a minimum price if the prices of the three shirts are Rs. 1,250, Rs. 1,540 and Rs. 1,375?

<span style="">If sin A = 4/5, then what is the value of sin</span><span style=" line-height: 0; position: relative; vertical-align: baseline; top: -0.5em; font-size:10.5px;">2&nbsp;</span><span style="">A?</span>
A solid metallic sphere of radius 12 cm is melted and recast into a cone having diameter of the base as 12 cm. What is the height of the cone?

<p><span style="">In the given figure, if PA and PB are tangents to the circle with centre O such that &ang;APB = 54&deg;, then&nbsp;</span><span style="">&ang;</span><span style="">OBA = ________.</span></p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/03/F1_SSC_Amit%20A_09-03-2023_D10.png" style="width: 279px; height: 186px;" /></p>

<p style="">In the figure, XYZ is a secant and ZT is a tangent to the circle at T. If TZ = 12&nbsp;cm and YZ = 8 cm, then find the length of XY.</p>

<p style=""><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/08/F3_SSC_Arbaz_8-8-2023_D11.png" style="width: 250px; height: 150px;" /></p>
A dishonest dealer sells the goods at 7% loss on cost price but uses 18% less weight. What is his percentage of profit? (Correct to 2 decimal places)
If x + y + z = 0 and x<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;+ y<sup>2</sup> + z<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;= 40, then what is the value of xy + yz + zx?

The expenditure on the cost of living of a man and his family is 60% of his salary. He gets two increment of 30% and 60% in his salary. If his saving increases by 250% of his initial saving, then the new cost of living expenditure is what percentage (rounded off to the nearest integer) of the increased salary?

<span style="">If two isosceles triangles </span>have their corresponding angles equal and&nbsp;their areas&nbsp;<span style="">are in the ratio of x</span><sup>2</sup>&nbsp;∶ y<sup>2</sup>,<span style=""> then the ratio of their corresponding heights is:</span>
A sum of money doubles itself in 7 years at simple interest. In how much time will it become 5 times of itself?
If a 7-digit number 54p3987 is divisible by 11, then p is equal to:

<p style=""><strong>Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the underlined word.</strong></p>

<p style="">Social economics is a meta-discipline in which economics is&nbsp;<u>entrenched</u>&nbsp;in social, political and cultural behaviours.</p>

<p><strong>Select the most appropriate synonym of the bracketed word to fill in the blank.</strong></p>

<p>Your words seemed more like a demand rather than a _________ (request).</p>

<p><strong>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the underlined group of words in the following sentence.</strong></p>

<p>Sita seems&nbsp;<u>not to be affected by the pleasures and pains of life.</u></p>

<p><strong>Select the most appropriate meaning of the given idiom.</strong></p>

<p>Red tape</p>

options.value: Catch someone at the moment they are doing something wrong
Official rules and bureaucracy that make it difficult to do something
Have a negative amount in your bank balance
Something unimportant that takes attention away from the main subject

<p><strong>Select the correct passive form of the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>He drank a lot of coffee before the marathon.</p>

options.value: A lot of coffee was drunk by him before the marathon.
A lot of coffee is drunk by him before the marathon.
A lot of coffee was drunken by him before the marathon.
A lot of coffee had been drunk by him before the marathon.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that expresses the given sentence in passive voice.</strong></p>

<p>They flew a kite in the evening.</p>

options.value: A kite was being flown by them in the evening.
In the evening, a kite have been flown by them.
A kite has been flown by them since evening.
A kite was flown by them in the evening.

questions.original_question:

<p style="">Let us know what you think&nbsp;<u>in black and white.</u></p>

<p><strong>Select the correct direct form of the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>Meena said that her parents were getting divorced.</p>

options.value: Meena said, &quot;My parents are getting divorced.&quot;
Meena said, &quot;My parents will be getting divorced.&quot;
Meena said, &quot;My parents were getting divorced.&quot;
